name: Quasar: Galactic Everyman Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Before becoming a superhero, which organization did Quasar work for?
questions.explanation:
S.H.I.E.L.D.

	Run by Colonel Nick Fury, S.H.I.E.L.D. has featured prominently in the Marvel Universe. It is a counterterrorism outfit that deals regularly with superhuman threats.

questions.text: Quasar wields the Quantum Bands. What is needed to wear these?
questions.explanation:
A flexible will.

	Rather than a strong, unbending will, Quantum Bands require a flexible will. Quasar learned this when he first donned them and felt an energy buildup that threatened to destroy him.

questions.text: Quasar has never adopted another moniker for his superheroing.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Quasar has been known as both Marvel Boy and Marvel Man, although he has been known as Quasar for most of his career. The original Marvel Boy was active in the 1950's, and Quasar inherited the bands from him indirectly.

questions.text: To which planet does Quasar travel to learn the true nature of the Quantum Bands?
questions.explanation:
Uranus.

	The cause of much snickering in grade school, Uranus is a gaseous planet and was discovered by William Herschel.

questions.text: Who bestowed the title of Protector of the Universe upon Quasar?
questions.explanation:
Eon.

	Eon was an Eternal, an alien who lived on Uranus. He revealed the true nature of the Quantum Bands and offered the role of Protector of the Universe to Quasar.

Wendell Vaughn.

	Wendell Vaughn was an operative for S.H.I.E.L.D. before he became Quasar. As Quasar, he has taken part in many intergalactic adventures!

Wisconsin.

	Wendell calls Fond du Lac, Wisconsin, home. French for "Bottom of the Lake", it was home to about 42,000 people according to the 2000 census.

questions.text: When did Quasar's first solo series begin?
questions.explanation:
1989.

	Written by Mark Gruenwald, the series ran for sixty issues. It was during this series that Quasar was dubbed the Protector of the Universe by Eon.

questions.text: Shortly after shunning his Protector of the Universe role, Quasar was killed by Thanos.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Maelstrom, the "Cosmic Assassin" killed both Quasar and his mentor Eon. Quasar had had a disagreement with Eon previously, and gave up his title of Protector of the Universe. Quasar was reborn, as so many killed superheroes are.

questions.text: Annihilus killed Quasar again, but although the man is dead, the name has lived on. Fula-Vell became the new Quasar.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Phyla-Vell became the new Quasar after inheriting the Quantum Bands. She said that, when given the choice, the Bands chose a new host, and a good one at that!
